doc:
Gil Hill https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gil_Hill 0 Gilbert Roland "Gil" Hill (November 5, 1931 – February 29, 2016) was an American police officer, actor and the president of the Detroit City Council. He gained recognition for his role as Inspector Todd in the Beverly Hills Cop film series. Gilbert_Roland_"_Gil_"_Hill ( November_5_,_1931 – February_29_,_2016 ) was an_American_police_officer , actor and the_president of the_Detroit_City_Council . He gained recognition for his_role as Inspector_Todd in the_Beverly_Hills_Cop_film_series .
